summary: RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE ABOUT FAULTY AIRBAG/SEATBELT PRETENSIONER. DEALERSHIP SAYS THEY HAVE NO FIX YET BUT IT'S A BIG DEAL TO ME BECAUSE THIS AFFECTS SAFETY DEVICES AND POTENTIALLY MY FAMILY'S SAFETY. I HAD TO HARD BRAKE THE OTHER DAY AND MY SON'S SEAT BELT DIDN'T LOCK AND HE FELL OVER IN HIS BOOSTER SEAT
